column5: Our place is close to family-friendly activities, the city center, and the airport. A peaceful and comfortable place on a five acres green-land! If you like to unplug from the world but to be near the full action city of Austin, this is perfect! Relax & Rejuvenate at home, but don't miss cool live music evenings Downtown Austin on 6th street!  Five mins drive from Ghost Town, Manor TX! Family-friendly venue featuring Old West storefronts, a maze & games, and ten mins from Elgin Historic city!
column8: Authentic Country Setting near Austin TX
